DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect investigational multi-purpose disinfect solution ( MPDS ) compare market multi-purpose solution moisture silicone hydrogel contact lenses .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Investigational Multi-Purpose Solution Lens Moisture
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old . Wears silicone hydrogel contact lenses daily wear basis i.e . disinfects lenses every night ) . Has successfully wear contact lenses 5 day , 8 hour per day , prior baseline visit . Vision correctable 20/30 good eye distance study lenses baseline visit . Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Known sensitivity intolerance contact lens multipurpose solution . Use topical ocular OTC prescribe topical ocular medication . History current ocular infection ocular inflammatory event . Ocular surgery within past year . Medical condition use medication cause ocular side effect . Participation investigational study within past 30 day . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
